verses.kjv: I will sing of mercy and judgment: unto thee, O LORD, will I sing.
verses.ct: I will sing about your mercy and justice; to you, LORD, I will raise my song.

verses.kjv: I will behave myself wisely in a perfect way. O when wilt thou come unto me? I will walk within my house with a perfect heart.
verses.ct: I will live with integrity and wisdom. When will you come to me? I will conduct myself with a blameless heart in my own home.

verses.kjv: I will set no wicked thing before mine eyes: I hate the work of them that turn aside; it shall not cleave to me.
verses.ct: I will refuse to focus on anything worthless. I despise the actions of those who stray from what is right — their ways will never cling to me.

verses.kjv: A froward heart shall depart from me: I will not know a wicked person.
verses.ct: I will reject every twisted desire; I want nothing to do with evil people.

verses.kjv: Whoso privily slandereth his neighbour, him will I cut off: him that hath an high look and a proud heart will not I suffer.
verses.ct: Whoever secretly spreads lies about their neighbor — I will silence them. Anyone with arrogant eyes and a prideful heart — I will not tolerate them.

verses.kjv: Mine eyes shall be upon the faithful of the land, that they may dwell with me: he that walketh in a perfect way, he shall serve me.
verses.ct: I will look for the faithful people in the land so they can live alongside me. Those who walk with integrity will be the ones who serve me.

verses.kjv: He that worketh deceit shall not dwell within my house: he that telleth lies shall not tarry in my sight.
verses.ct: No one who practices deception will live in my house. No one who tells lies will remain in my presence.

verses.kjv: I will early destroy all the wicked of the land; that I may cut off all wicked doers from the city of the LORD.
verses.ct: Every morning I will root out all the wicked from the land, removing every evildoer from the city of the LORD.
